Class CompoundJob

java.lang.Object
Job
CompoundJob
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<Job>
public class CompoundJob
extends Job
this class represents a job that is made of many other smaller jobs
Author:
Omar Loudghiri

  • Constructor Details

    • CompoundJob

      public CompoundJob​(int profit, Job... subJobs)
      creates an instance of a compound job and initializes the values of the compound job
      Parameters:
      profit - how much money will the completion of this job make
      subJobs - the array that contains the subjobs of this compound job
